{{BLP sources|date=July 2014}} {{Use mdy dates|date=April 2014}} {{Infobox ice hockey player | name = Marko Virtanen | image = | caption = | image_size = 225px | played_for = '''''[[SM-liiga]]'''''
[[JYP Jyväskylä]]
'''''[[Swedish Hockey League|Elitserien]]'''''
[[Färjestad BK]]
[[Södertälje SK]] | position = [[Winger (ice hockey)|Right Wing]] | height_ft = 5 | height_in = 10 | weight_lb = 181 | shoots = Left | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1968|12|10}} | birth_place = [[Jyväskylä]], [[Finland]] | draft = Undrafted | career_start = 1988 | career_end = 2000 }} '''Marko Virtanen''' (born December 10, 1968) is a [[Finland|Finnish]] former professional [[ice hockey]] player. He is currently the head coach of [[JYP Jyväskylä]] in the Finnish [[Liiga]]. Virtanen assumed the position of head coach for JYP with the [[2013–14 Liiga season]].{{cite web | url=http://www.jypliiga.fi/uutiset/marko-virtanen-jypin-paavalmentajaksi-2013-2015 | title=Marko Virtanen JYPin päävalmentajaksi 2013 – 2015 | publisher=Jypliiga | accessdate=25 July 2014 | deadurl=yes | archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150316112244/http://www.jypliiga.fi/uutiset/marko-virtanen-jypin-paavalmentajaksi-2013-2015 | archivedate=March 16, 2015 | df=mdy-all }} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{Eliteprospects}} *{{hockeydb|34132|Marko Virtanen}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Virtanen, Marko}} [[Category:1968 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Färjestad BK players]] [[Category:Finnish ice hockey coaches]] [[Category:Finnish ice hockey players]] [[Category:JYP Jyväskylä players]] [[Category:Södertälje SK players]] {{Finland-icehockey-player-stub}}

revision.text:
{{refimprove|date=September 2018}} {{Infobox film | name = Before the Winter Chill | image = | director = [[Philippe Claudel]] | producer = | Script = | starring = [[Daniel Auteuil]]
[[Kristin Scott Thomas]]
[[Leïla Bekhti]]
[[Richard Berry (actor)|Richard Berry]] | cinematography = | music = | country = France | language = French | runtime = 103 minutes | released = {{Film date|2013|8|30|[[Telluride Film Festival|TFF]]|df=yes}} | budget = $8 million | gross = $2.6 millionhttp://www.jpbox-office.com/fichfilm.php?id=13792 }} '''Before the Winter Chill''' ({{lang-fr|Avant l'hiver}}) is a 2013 French drama film directed by [[Philippe Claudel]]. ==Synopsis== Philippe Claudel and Kristin Scott Thomas reunite in this subtle story of a man thrust into a mid-life crisis by a chance meeting. He is torn between a loving wife and his dangerous attraction for a troubled, mysterious young woman. Paul has never questioned his choices. Married right out of med school to the stunning Lucie, who set aside her own career to accommodate his brilliant one as a brain surgeon, he has been faithful, has earned the respect of his peers, raised a son and built a lovely home. Life is good. But now, at this point in his life, something might threaten all that. It starts after his meeting with young and mysterious Lou who keeps turning up in his life. When roses are delivered daily at his office and home, Paul presumes Lou is stalking him, yet he can't resist the lure of an ambiguous and dangerous relationship with her. Fascinated by her emotional frailty, her mystery and grace, Paul fails to see that he might be the target of a sinister plot, something dark and twisted that could threaten everything he's built and everyone he loves. In the end he discovers that everything she has told him about herself is a lie and we are left with the picture of a man struggling to return to the quiet and boring life he lived before he met Lou. The film received a 71% fresh rating on Rotten Tomatoes based on 17 reviews with an average rating of 5.7/10.{{Citation|title=Before the Winter Chill|url=https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/before_the_winter_chill|language=en|accessdate=2018-05-31}} == Cast == [[File:Avp avant l'hiver 2013.jpg|thumb|Avant l'hiver premiere in Paris]] * [[Daniel Auteuil]] as Paul * [[Kristin Scott Thomas]] as Lucie * [[Leïla Bekhti]] as Lou * [[Richard Berry (actor)|Richard Berry]] as Gérard * [[Laure Killing]] as Mathilde * [[Jérôme Varanfrain]] as Victor * [[Vicky Krieps]] as Caroline * [[Anne Metzler]] as Zoé Gassard * [[Annette Schlechter]] as Madame Malek * [[Laurent Claret]] as Denis * [[Jean-Louis Sbille]] as Fred * [[Lucie Debay]] as Lou's friend ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == {{Commons category|Avant l'hiver}} * {{IMDb title|2231630}} *{{rotten-tomatoes|before_the_winter_chill}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Before the Winter Chill}} [[Category:2013 films]] [[Category:2010s drama films]] [[Category:French drama films]] [[Category:French-language films]] [[Category:French films]] {{2010s-France-film-stub}}
